DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : A good 60 % patient present upper abdominal complaint functional dyspepsia . Since many patient functional gastrointestinal disease anxious depress comparison healthy control , several study investigate use antidepressant agent patient . Although many study underpowered , promise result obtain tricyclic antidepressant mianserin patient irritable bowel syndrome . There still need placebo control study antidepressant patient functional dyspepsia . OBJECTIVE : To investigate effectiveness venlafaxine , selective serotonin norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor , treatment patient functional dyspepsia . STUDY DESIGN : A randomized , double blind , placebo control trial . STUDY POPULATION : Consecutive patient persistent upper GI symptom without abnormality upper gastrointestinal endoscopy . PRIMARY ENDPOINTS : Upper gastrointestinal symptom absence 6 week treatment . SECONDARY ENDPOINTS : - Anxiety depression venlafaxine treatment ; - Health related quality life venlafaxine treatment ; - The association serotonin transporter protein 5-HT receptor polymorphism efficacy venlafaxine . STUDY PROCEDURE : A venous blood sample collect 10ml EDTA-tube . Then , subject randomize treatment Efexor XR ( first last two week 75 mg 1dd third fifth week 75 mg 2dd ) identical placebo 8 week . Before start finishing treatment , patient ask fill questionnaire intensity gastrointestinal complaint , current quality life anxiety depression .
